channel.title: Repairing Testscape Source bugs... (Like character rights) it dont works
channel.description:
Howdy... can someone help me to repair this bug... cuz i tried all character rights... Standard: character-rights = 3 ... when i loged on i tried commands..... ( character-rights = 1-3)... it didn't worked.. but on others sources it's work... and when i loGOOUT!!!!! character-rights = 3 DISSAPEARS!!!!!!
Please help me!

item.title: Repairing Testscape Source bugs... (Like character rights) it dont works
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

don’t use testscape, you gotta go into the client.java every time you wanna add a new admin or mod (which means you need to compile and it’s a pain in the ass if you wanna add just one person while running your server…)
